title: New: Plastic Flowers – Summertime Pop
content:
Greek indie pop duo Plastic Flowers just released their rather fantastic new single Summertime Pop ahead of their debut full length release which will drop on March 3. Its old fashioned, guitar driven, c-86 inspired sugary pop smells like flowers in the spring time while it carries a fragile sign of classic in the most innocent, unpretentious manner. Stream it below and stay tuned for Evergreen LP set to drop via Crash Symbols and Inner Ear which also includes contributions from Keep Shelly In Athens and Ed Askew.
